creator: Shoptagr
descriptionHtml:
Window shopping for those new shoes or that new dress? Want to know if it comes back in stock or when it goes on sale in your size and favorite color?

When you discover something you plan to buy, save it to Shoptagr.

Shoptagr is your happy place to quickly save the products you plan to buy soon across multiple external sites and apps.

Save any clothing item from any store to Shoptagr and organize everything in one place. You'll automatically get notified when it’s on sale, low in stock or back in stock (right down to your size and preferred color).

Stop leaving items you want in the shopping cart or emailing yourself links - just install Shoptagr and never forget where you saw that beautiful purse.

Online window shopping has never been easier... and smarter!
--

SAVE IT NOW. SHOP IT LATER
The next time you discover an item you plan to buy soon, just save it to Shoptagr. It’ll automatically sync across your phone, tablet, and computer so you can come back to it whenever and wherever you’d like.

You can save to Shoptagr from most places, including your computer, Safari, Chrome, email, and your favorite shopping apps.

SMART NOTIFICATIONS
Receive Instant notifications when items you save go on sale, become low in stock or if they come back in stock, right down to your preferred size and color!

BEAUTIFUL AND SIMPLE
Keep everything you find in Shoptagr in a clean, easy-to-view layout that’s free of distractions. You can always get back to your items again when you are ready to finally make that purchase.

PRIVATE LISTS
Create your own private shopping lists with Shoptagr and organize items you discover accross the web in one single place. Create lists such as Work Wardrobe, Birthday Wishes, Nights Out or Nice to Haves.

SAVE FROM MORE THAN 700 OF THE BIGGEST BRANDS AND STORES!

* Nordstrom
* ASOS
* Net-A-Porter
* Shopbop
* Amazon
* Farfetch
* eBay
* Lulu's
* Yoox
* Anthropology
* Forever21
* Barneys and many more...

SAVE FROM MULTIPLE DEVICES
Save items to Shoptagr from your phone and with one click using Shoptagr’s desktop browser button for Safari, Chrome, and Firefox.

FEATURED BY
Shoptagr has been featured by major publications including:

* InStyle
* Women's Wear Daily
* Fashionista
* Stylelist
* Brit + Co
* BuzzFeed
* Yahoo Shine
* Ubergizmo
* ABC
* Tyra Banks Show

And many more....
descriptionShort: Save products from other websites and get notified when they goes on sale

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Shoptagr 2.2 App is Here…

What’s new?
Discover our new Live Coupon Feed available on the coupons tab. You’ll be able to browse real-time coupons for 10,000+ retailers or search for top deals from your favorite stores! Coming soon! Shoptagr cashback is almost here! Cashback will allow you to earn real money automatically when you shop from top retailers!

All you need to do is
1) browse our list of eligible retailers
2) shop for your must-have items
3) activate your earnings!

title: Shoptagr

creator: Shoptagr
descriptionHtml:
Window shopping for those new shoes or that new dress? Want to know if it comes back in stock or when it goes on sale in your size and favorite color?

When you discover something you plan to buy, save it to Shoptagr.

Shoptagr is your happy place to quickly save the products you plan to buy soon across multiple external sites and apps.

Save any clothing item from any store to Shoptagr and organize everything in one place. You'll automatically get notified when it’s on sale, low in stock or back in stock (right down to your size and preferred color).

Stop leaving items you want in the shopping cart or emailing yourself links - just install Shoptagr and never forget where you saw that beautiful purse.

Online window shopping has never been easier... and smarter!

SAVE IT NOW. SHOP IT LATER
The next time you discover an item you plan to buy soon, just save it to Shoptagr. It’ll automatically sync across your phone, tablet, and computer so you can come back to it whenever and wherever you’d like.

You can save to Shoptagr from most places, including your computer, Safari, Chrome, email, and your favorite shopping apps.

SMART NOTIFICATIONS
Receive Instant notifications when items you save go on sale, become low in stock or if they come back in stock, right down to your preferred size and color!

BEAUTIFUL AND SIMPLE
Keep everything you find in Shoptagr in a clean, easy-to-view layout that’s free of distractions. You can always get back to your items again when you are ready to finally make that purchase.

PRIVATE LISTS
Create your own private shopping lists with Shoptagr and organize items you discover accross the web in one single place. Create lists such as Work Wardrobe, Birthday Wishes, Nights Out or Nice to Haves.

descriptionHtml:
Window shopping for those new shoes or that new dress? Want to know if it comes back in stock or when it goes on sale in your size and favorite color?

When you discover something you plan to buy, save it to Shoptagr.

Shoptagr is your happy place to quickly save the products you plan to buy soon across multiple external sites and apps.

Save any clothing item from any store to Shoptagr and organize everything in one place. You'll automatically get notified when it’s on sale, low in stock or back in stock (right down to your size and preferred color).

Stop leaving items you want in the shopping cart or emailing yourself links - just install Shoptagr and never forget where you saw that beautiful purse.

Online window shopping has never been easier... and smarter!
--

SAVE IT NOW. SHOP IT LATER
The next time you discover an item you plan to buy soon, just save it to Shoptagr. It’ll automatically sync across your phone, tablet, and computer so you can come back to it whenever and wherever you’d like.

You can save to Shoptagr from most places, including your computer, Safari, Chrome, email, and your favorite shopping apps.

SMART NOTIFICATIONS
Receive Instant notifications when items you save go on sale, become low in stock or if they come back in stock, right down to your preferred size and color!

BEAUTIFUL AND SIMPLE
Keep everything you find in Shoptagr in a clean, easy-to-view layout that’s free of distractions. You can always get back to your items again when you are ready to finally make that purchase.

PRIVATE LISTS
Create your own private shopping lists with Shoptagr and organize items you discover accross the web in one single place. Create lists such as Work Wardrobe, Birthday Wishes, Nights Out or Nice to Haves.

SAVE FROM MORE THAN 700 OF THE BIGGEST BRANDS AND STORES!

* Nordstrom
* ASOS
* Net-A-Porter
* Shopbop
* Amazon
* Farfetch
* eBay
* Lulu's
* Yoox
* Anthropology
* Forever21
* Barneys and many more...

SAVE FROM MULTIPLE DEVICES
Save items to Shoptagr from your phone and with one click using Shoptagr’s desktop browser button for Safari, Chrome, and Firefox.

FEATURED BY
Shoptagr has been featured by major publications including:

* InStyle
* Women's Wear Daily
* Fashionista
* Stylelist
* Brit + Co
* BuzzFeed
* Yahoo Shine
* Ubergizmo
* ABC
* Tyra Banks Show

And many more....
descriptionShort: Save products from other websites and get notified when they go on sale

creator: Shoptagr
descriptionHtml:
It’s time to say goodbye to mindless shopping and hello to your new shopping assistant!

By using clever technology, the Karma app can help you shop smarter and save you both time and money!

PLAN YOUR NEXT PURCHASES
Easily save your favorite items for later from thousands of stores, so you can purchase it when you’re ready.

ACCESS EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
It keeps an eye on all your saved items for you in one place so that you can stay organized.

NEVER MISS OUT!
It sends you real-time price and inventory updates on products you’ve saved, so you can make sure to purchase at the right time.

EARN CASHBACK
Karma gives you full access to automatic cashback on hundreds of retailers. No points. No gimmicks. Real cash.
descriptionShort: Save products from other websites and get notified when they go on sale

title: Karma: Your Shopping Assistant

creator: Shoptagr
descriptionHtml:
It’s time to say goodbye to mindless shopping and hello to your new shopping assistant!

By using clever technology, the Karma app can help you shop smarter and save you both time and money!

PLAN YOUR NEXT PURCHASES
Easily save your favorite items for later from thousands of stores, so you can purchase it when you’re ready.

ACCESS EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
It keeps an eye on all your saved items for you in one place so that you can stay organized.

NEVER MISS OUT!
It sends you real-time price and inventory updates on products you’ve saved, so you can make sure to purchase at the right time.

EARN CASHBACK
Karma gives you full access to automatic cashback on hundreds of retailers. No points. No gimmicks. Real cash.
descriptionShort: Save products from other websites and get notified when they go on sale

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We get it. Having to switch back and forth between shopping apps is a real pain in the cart! That’s why we’ve gathered all the important deets all in one place: the Karma app.

Ready to get up close? Simply tap any item to get started.

This new version makes it easier to manage item specifics, edit notifications, add items to lists, and more – Just tap the edit button at the top of the page. Plus, scroll down to see price trends for that item and what like-minded shoppers are shopping for!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Same Karma, cuter outfit!
We're excited to announce that we went full 'movie makeover montage' and got ourselves a brand new look!
New logo, new colors, new icons, new everything - all with our smart shoppers in mind. Scroll through our brand new & improved App and get the things you want for less. From inspo to checkout - Karma is here to do the whole shopping online thing better. Download now

title: Karma | Shop like a pro

creator: Karma Shopping LTD
descriptionHtml:
Karma is the smart shopping app your phone was craving. Buy whatever from wherever for the lowest possible price every. single. time.

One wishlist for all the brands
Save items from over 100K stores to create one big sharable wishlist.

Real-time Alerts
No shopping fomo here. With Karma, you'll get buzzed when items drop in price or come back in stock.

Coupons
We’ll search, find, and auto-apply coupons at checkout to get you the best deal.

Cashback
Get actual money back into your account when you buy with Karma.

Pay with K
Pay with Karma for one-tap checkouts and the lowest possible price every time.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Enjoy savvy shopping with Karma’s latest release. Our new auto-fill feature swiftly enters your credit card details on retailer sites, making checkouts a breeze. Paired with our improved search function, finding your desired items has never been easier. The beloved multi-tab browsing remains, allowing for seamless transitions between stores – it's like having an expansive mall right in your pocket. Upgrade your wishlist, get unbeatable deals, and shop smarter with Karma.

title: Karma | Shop like a pro

creator: Karma Shopping LTD
descriptionHtml:
Say hello to Karma, your next-generation shopping browser with a built in assistant! We're here to add a sprinkle of ease and a whole lot of fun to your online shopping journey:

Super-Easy Navigation: Our smooth interface is like a VIP pass to all your favorite stores and sought-after products. Breeze between your saved items and our extensive shopping browser, picking up exactly where you left off. Shopping has never been so seamless!

Your Very Own Shopping Pal: Karma is your co-pilot in the shopping journey, giving you all the juicy details to decide if it's the right product, priced just right, and the perfect time to snap it up. We've got your back!

Price Tracking Pro: Karma diligently keeps an eye on the prices of your saved items, alerting you when the price drops - so you'll always buy at the perfect moment!

Coupon Scanner Extraordinaire: Check out our snazzy automated coupon scanner that struts in at checkout, finds the best discounts on the web and applies them for you. And guess what? You can even hunt for coupons from any store before you start shopping.

Timely Stock and Sale Alerts: Be the first to know with Karma's alerts for low stock, back in stock, or sale events for your wishlist items. Stay in the know and never miss out!

Dream Wishlist Wonderland: Create and manage your dream wishlist with Karma. Keep track of all your shopping desires without stepping out of the app.

So, ready to add a dash of Karma to your shopping? Join our community and let's make shopping smarter, together!
descriptionShort: Save items from any website and get notified when it’s the right time to buy

The beloved multi-tab browsing remains, allowing for seamless transitions between stores – it's like having an expansive mall right in your pocket. Upgrade your wishlist, get unbeatable deals, and shop smarter with Karma.
